sentences.en: Always be in ponder over condition, be in namely guide!
sentences.cn: 总处于思考状态, 就是在引导!

sentences.en: He continued to ponder the problem as he walked home.
sentences.cn: 他一边往家走一边继续思考那个问题。

sentences.en: He often inspires us to ponder over questions this way.
sentences.cn: 他常用这种方式启发我们思考问题.

sentences.en: He sits to ponder his misfortune there.
sentences.cn: 他坐在那里沉思着他的不幸.

sentences.en: He wanted to think about it -- to ponder over it, to decide whether it were best.
sentences.cn: 他要好好想一想 -- 仔细地考虑一下, 决定这是否是上策.

sentences.en: I look at the swaying branches and ponder over the greatness of all things.
sentences.cn: 我看着摇曳的树枝,想念万物的伟大.

sentences.en: I want to quietly ponder what we to do next.
sentences.cn: 我想静静想一想下一步怎么办.

sentences.en: I'll check on my heart, and ponder on more principles.
sentences.cn: 我会搞清楚自己的心意, 并仔细考虑更多的原则.

sentences.en: Point to Ponder: Life is a test and a trust.
sentences.cn: 思考重点: 人生是考验,也是受托.

sentences.en: Point to Ponder: this world is not my home.
sentences.cn: 思考重点: 这世界非我家.

sentences.en: So be sure to ponder your reasons when choosing the ternary operator.
sentences.cn: 所以在挑选三元运算符时,请务必权衡一下利弊.

sentences.en: The visitor can ponder over the boomerangs used by aborigines at the time of Cook.
sentences.cn: 来访者可以琢磨琢磨土著人在库克时期用的回飞镖.

sentences.en: These are minor problems over which you needn't ponder to long.
sentences.cn: 有些小问题你不必考虑过多.

sentences.en: They were left to ponder on the implications of the announcement.
sentences.cn: 他们被留下来琢磨这项宣告的含义.

sentences.en: They would do well to pause and ponder upon their new responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 人们最好还是停一停,好好地想一想自己所负的新责任.

sentences.en: You should pause and ponder now.
sentences.cn: 你现在应该停下来仔细考虑一下.

words.tran_cn: 有重量的；可称量的；有价值的

trans.tran_en: to spend time thinking carefully and seriously about a problem, a difficult question, or something that has happened
